_header: But Thou glorious Lord Thou quickenest the dead
_description: Prayer in Rolle’s Meditations on the Passion, following 101 after a brief prose passage

CULLl18.Transcription:
but þou gloryouse lord þou quykenyst þe dede&
                    turnyd hast þou manyfold and brouȝt hem to heuenly medeþe
                    blynde born þou lyȝted in book os i redeit betokenyth gostely
                    werkys it is no drede
CULLl18.Editions:
Allen,  Hope Emily. 
             English Writings of Richard Rolle.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1931: 25.
